name: Ant Apocalypse
description:
Oh no! There's ants everywhere! It's the Ant Apocalypse!

Playing
  • Use your bug spray to eliminate the ants.
  • Avoid the ants biting you.
  • Survive as many waves as you can.
  • Running out of bug spray or health will end the round.
Controls
  • WASD / arrow keys - Move
  • Mouse - Aim bug spray
  • Left-click - Use bug spray
  • Right-click - Throw bug spray
  • Escape - Quit
Credits
  • Music  
    • From https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3562-crossing-the-chasm
    • "Crossing the Chasm" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) 
    • License: CC-BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
  • Grass texture 
    • From https://opengameart.org/content/grass-tileset-16x16 
    • "Grass Tileset 16x16" by Bonsaiheldin (http://bonsaiheld.org) 
    • License: CC-BY-SA (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/)

This game is an entry for Wowie Jam 2.0!, and will remain in development after the jam has ended.
